title: Model&Sim:Found&Implemen
description: Foundations and algorithms concerning the development of conceptual models for systems, and their realization in the form of computer software; discrete and continuous models. Crosslisted with ECE 6730.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2605 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (CS 1332 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1372 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
